trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Havertown
There were no other sightings in Havertown on or around October 15th 2011
Summary: White, cigar-shaped, with broad black band 1/3 down from front. MUCH slower than a plane. Moving steadily, silently from N-to-S. Used binoculars, but found no other exterior appendages.
divs: Sighting DetailsSee short description. (Live within a Philadelphia Airport flight paths, and have become used to many different types and speeds of familiar craft.)
